name: Psalm 5:9-13
description:
In the game "Psalm 5:9-13" you have to plunge into a terrifying place, at first glance it is quite normal, but the further you go, the more it reveals its essence. This horror game is a first-person walking simulator with a VHS effect and a tense atmosphere, explore the location, find anomalies, and move on. Frightening things will await you along the way, are you ready to face THIS?

The average time to complete the game is 30 minutes

Game Features:

-Walking simulator
-VHS filter
-High quality sounds
-Realistic graphics
